bike.description: Fuji Altair 2 custom butted aluminum with PowerDiamond down tube, Integrated head tube, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji carbon seat stays, Fuji Altair 2 aluminum chain stays, Fuji forged road dropout with replaceable derailleur hanger,

components.description: FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer
FSA Gossamer Pro MegaExo w/ Integrated spindle, 39/53T 7075 CNC AL
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-Speed Flight Deck compatible
Cane Creek SCR-3 dual pivot w/cartridge pads
Tange IS-24 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow top cap
Fuji UltraLite 6061 Double Butted, 31.8mm w/Anatomical drops
Fuji Pro Ultalite Forged Alloy +/- 7 degree
